whySection.title: ðŸ’¡ Why does Reviewsvisor work?
whySection.feature1Desc: Reviewsvisor transforms your reviews into insights in seconds, enabling you to make quick and reliable decisions. With a clear and visual synthesis, you spot key trends and action priorities that matter to your establishment. The analysis also highlights your strengths to consolidate what works.
whySection.feature2Desc: Reviewsvisor doesn't just identify problems... it proposes concrete and prioritized solutions. Each recommendation is measurable, linked to customer satisfaction, to help you act effectively and track your progress over time.
whySection.feature3Desc: AI detects emotions, recurring problems and improvement opportunities with exceptional precision. It measures the tone of reviews and highlights weak signals to reveal true customer loyalty drivers.
whySection.feature4Desc: Reviewsvisor helps you increase your online rating, attract more customers and improve your revenue.
whySection.stat1: see up to +25% more positive reviews,
whySection.stat2: generate on average +10% to +20% more revenue,
whySection.stat3: gain +0.5 to +1 point in rating in a few weeks.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find quick answers to your questions and learn how to use Reviewsvisor effectively.
help.teamHere: Our team is here to help you use Reviewsvisor.
help.faq1Question: How do I import my Google reviews?
help.faq1Answer:
You can import your Google reviews in two ways:
- by importing a file via Google Takeout,
- or via automatic retrieval if your establishment is connected.

Each method is explained step by step directly in the "Instructions" section.
help.faq2Question: What if I can't find my establishment?
help.faq2Answer:
Make sure your establishment is visible on Google Maps and associated with the correct Google Business Profile.

If the problem persists, you can import your reviews manually via Google Takeout or contact our support for verification.
help.faq3Question: Can I use Reviewsvisor for multiple establishments?
help.faq3Answer:
Yes. Reviewsvisor allows you to analyze multiple establishments from a single account.

Each establishment has its own analyses, recommendations, and review history.
help.faq4Question: Can I share the analyses with my team?
help.faq4Answer:
Yes. The analyses can be shared with your team to align everyone on improvement priorities (service, price, quality, organization).

This helps turn customer reviews into concrete actions.
help.faq5Question: Can I automatically respond to customer reviews?
help.faq5Answer:
Yes. Reviewsvisor offers an AI-assisted automatic response system.

You can generate responses adapted to the tone of reviews (positive or negative), while maintaining control before publication.

about.title: About
about.intro1: is an intelligent customer review analysis platform.
about.intro2: for your establishment that transforms your feedback into design.
about.introText1: Our technology transforms your customer reviews into precise insights to help you improve the experience, increase your online rating and optimize your services within your establishment
about.introHighlight1: your reviews now become a source of growth
about.introHighlight2: make the best decisions with your own data
about.missionText: At Reviewsvisor, our goal is simple: help every establishment understand what their customers really feel. We believe every review contains an opportunity for evolution, and that well-analyzed data can become a true growth engine.
about.whyText1: Restaurant owners, hoteliers and shop owners receive reviews every day, but rarely have time to analyze them in depth. Platforms are numerous, comments accumulate, and it becomes difficult to quickly identify what works... or what needs improvement.
about.whyText2: This is the problem Reviewsvisor was designed to solve:
about.techText1: Reviewsvisor uses an advanced analysis model capable of understanding the tone, emotion and important topics in each comment. The tool automatically identifies trends, detects recurring strengths and highlights priority improvement areas.
about.techText2: More than just a dashboard, Reviewsvisor is a true continuous improvement assistant for your establishment.
about.platformText: Whether you're a restaurant, hotel or shop, Reviewsvisor adapts to your daily life. Our interface was designed to be intuitive, fast and efficient, even for the least tech-savvy users.

instructions.step1: Go to Google Takeout via the official link
